biotools.summary: Tool to model the confidence with which mass modifications are correctly localized for each peptide. PTMProphet considers all of the possible configurations for localization, and applies a statistical model to predict which modification sites are most probable based on the spectrum evidence.

bioschemas.name: PTMProphet
